title: School of Dental Medicine Global Oral Health Fund
description: To support the School of Dental Medicine Global Oral Health Program including faculty, staff and student endeavors at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
marketingContent: The CU Guatemala Smiles Program is the global health imitative at the School of Dental Medicine in partnership with the CU Center for Global Health. Dental students and faculty travel to the permanent dental clinic 3-4 times a year to provide comprehensive dental care to a rural community in Guatemala where no dental care is available.
